NOT JUST ANOTHER BOXING GYM

Panther Gym is more than just a local boxing gym, it’s a place where a young athlete, a middle-aged business owner, a stay at home mom, a first timer, and a seasoned pro can all feel welcome, comfortable, and challenged to be their best.

We are more than just a training facility, with memberships including access to combat classes, gym area, steam rooms, juice bar, massage, acupuncture, and more.

If you’re looking for something more than your average boxing gym, then your search is over. We look forward to seeing you in the ring.

Read more

PANTHER CLASSES

Sign up for any of our active & engaging classes as a drop-in guest or full gym member and get your sweat on.
